channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-17123] Add postBulkLoadHFile variant that notifies the final paths for the hfiles
item.description:
Currently the postBulkLoadHFile() hook passes the same familyPaths parameter which it receives as method parameter.
See code in SecureBulkLoadManager :


       loaded = region.getCoprocessorHost().postBulkLoadHFile(familyPaths, loaded);

Meaning, the paths are not final, moved paths of the loaded hfiles.

This issue is to add a variant which notifies the final paths of the loaded hfiles.
item.summary: Add postBulkLoadHFile variant that notifies the final paths for the hfiles

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
SecureBulkLoadManager calls bulkLoadHFiles() of Region:


            return region.bulkLoadHFiles(familyPaths, true,

                new SecureBulkLoadListener(fs, bulkToken, conf), request.getCopyFile());

I plan to change the return value of bulkLoadHFiles() to Map<byte[], List<Path>>, corresponding to paths of the final hfiles.
Enis Soztutar:
What do you think ?

In patch v3, added the following hook which by default calls the existing hook:


  default boolean postBulkLoadHFile(final ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx,

    List<Pair<byte[], String>> familyPaths, Map<byte[], List<Path>> map,

    boolean hasLoaded) throws IOException {

-1 overall

The patch looks good. We want to also deprecate the RegionObserver method in favor of the previous one. Can you please rename the map argument to something like finalPaths or storeFiles. Maybe also change familyPaths to stagingFamilyPaths to make it explicit that these are paths in the staging directory.

deprecate the RegionObserver method in favor of the previous one

You mean deprecate the method without finalPaths parameter, right ?
Test failure in TestSaslFanOutOneBlockAsyncDFSOutput was not related.

+1 overall

This is committed I think.
There is one issue with the patch. RegionObserver added with new hook and added the def impl for it, calling the old hook. But BaseRegionObserver is having impl for both methods returning passed boolean. Normally users extend BaseRegionObserver and then we wont get the BC fix.
So in BaseRegionObserver we have to make the new hook to call the old method.
Here is addendum which addresses Anoop's comment.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build HBase-Trunk_matrix #1994 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/1994/)
